metadata.title: CVE-2023-33951 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition vulnerability was found in the vmwgfx driver in the Linuxkernel. The flaw exists within the handling of GEM objects. The issueresults from improper locking when performing operations on an object. Thisflaw allows a local privileged user to disclose information in the contextof the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
